>airly2002@... writes:
>
>
> >
> > "WEll stranger... "said Hidras by commlink"I know that you're here... OR
> > you're a brave bot or a stupid one to come here... Tell me rightnow your
> > intentions or" Hidras pressed a button and the auto-deffences started to
> > appear the hidden cannons that covered the bas "face your doom.... 
>ANSWER
> > NOW!"
> >
>
>Her optics watched as her com opened & she heard a voice, a deep male 
>voice.
>Almost familiar.. but...
>
>Great.. she was discovered. Of course, if she had her OLD form, this 
>wouldn't
>happen.
>
>No point in playing just a flesh animal... she was obviously detected by
>their scanners, showing up as a bot.
>
>She growled inwardly. The next time she gets back to Cybertron... she will
>personally deal with Alpha Trion... one way or another!
>
>The white tiger form stood up upon her paws as she bounced down the cliff
>from the ridge towards the Pred base. Once off the ridge, she transformed
>into a fembot... a Beast Machine.
>
>She smirked. "Merely.. curious. Just a ... lone Cybertronian.. in search of
>some answers."
>
>Pausing a moment, watching, her optics viewing & keeping tabs on the
>defenses. She was taking an awefully big risk doing this.  She may as well
>jump to her previous plan.
>
>"I seek an audience with the one known as... Hydras."
>
